GSD.description:
drbd: fix potential silent data corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 024c2a0db53a0f6f0f227ce6b88288e5b9e3f099. For more details please see the references link.
